import React, { useContext } from "react"; import { Link, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import { AuthContext } from "../contexts/AuthContext"; const NavigationBar = () => { const { user, logout,is } = useContext(AuthContext); const navigate = useNavigate(); const handleLogout = () => { logout(); navigate("/"); }; return (
{/* Logo */}
Exploro
{/* Desktop Navigation */}
Home {user ? ( <> {isOrganizer() ? ( Organizer Dashboard ) : ( Dashboard )} Hello, {user.name} ) : ( <> Login Sign Up )}
{/* Mobile menu button */}
{/* Mobile menu (hidden by default) */} {/* You can add state to show/hide this menu */}
Home {user ? ( <> Dashboard ) : ( <> Login Sign Up )}
); }; export default NavigationBar;
